definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
the first time/for the first time

sentences.english: The child went to sleep as soon as he touched the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子頭一沾枕頭就睡着了。

sentences.english: This individual had 9 out of 10 ewes die this year following birth.
sentences.chinese: 這個學生死了10頭母羊，其中9頭一出生就死了。

sentences.english: I can go to sleep the moment my head touches the pillow every day.
sentences.chinese: 我每天都是頭一挨枕，馬上就能睡着。
